note: All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Share of deaths from cardiovascular diseases
subtitle: The share of annual deaths caused by [cardiovascular disease](#dod:cvd), based on the [underlying cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.

display.name: Share of total deaths in both sexes aged all ages years that are from cardiovascular diseases
